words.source: H859 indep. pron. 2mp אַתֶּם 'you'; KJV 'go ye', ESV 'go', NASB 'go yourselves'
H3212 Qal imv. 2mp of הָלַךְ 'to go'; KJV 'go', ESV 'go', NASB 'go'
H3947 Qal imv. 2mp of לָקַח 'to take, get'; KJV 'get', ESV 'get', NASB 'get'
prep. l- + 2mp suff.; KJV 'you', ESV 'your own', NASB 'yourselves'
H8401 n.ms תֶּבֶן 'straw'; all trans. agree
H834 prep. מִן + rel. pron. אֲשֶׁר 'from wherever'; KJV 'where ye can find it', ESV 'wherever you can find it', NASB 'wherever you can find it'
H4672 Qal impf. 2mp of מָצָא 'to find'; KJV 'find', ESV 'find', NASB 'find'
H3588 conj. כִּי 'for, because, but'; KJV 'yet', ESV 'but', NASB 'but'
H369 neg. particle אֵין 'there is not, nothing'; KJV 'not ought', ESV 'none', NASB 'none'
H1639 Niphal ptc. ms of גָּרַע 'to diminish, reduce'; KJV 'shall not be diminished', ESV 'will be reduced', NASB 'will be reduced'
H5656 prep. מִן + n.fs + 2mp suff. of עֲבוֹדָה 'work, service'; KJV 'from your work', ESV 'from your work', NASB 'from your work'
H1697 n.ms דָּבָר 'word, thing, matter'; KJV 'ought', ESV 'in the least', NASB 'at all'
